files.description: Refactored, modular implementation of customer discovery output generation (replacing the monolithic logic) with clear public APIs and reusable helpers.

files.description: Utilities to load, normalize, and manage the historical prompt artifacts (the timestamped *_prompt.txt files) in a reusable, testable way.

files.description: Shared rendering/formatting helpers (e.g., deterministic section building, safe markdown/text composition) used by outputs and prompt artifact handling.

SUMMARY: Added a compact rendering utility module with deterministic section/list helpers and safe Markdown/text normalization primitives for reuse across outputs and prompt artifact handling.
